articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il enjoys art performances
Pres. Kim Il Sung's birthday to be commemorated in Madagascar
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il enjoys art performances
   Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Secretary Kim Jong Il, 
Chairman of the DPRK National Defence 
Commission and Supreme Commander of the Korean People's 
Army (KPA), on Monday enjoyed the light comedy "Blessings" 
performed by artistes of the KPA april 25 film studio and a 
performance given by the art propaganda team of KPA large 
combined unit 337.
   The light comedy is based on the heroic efforts of 
servicemen to work a miracle of Korea in the 1990s through 
the construction of the anbyon youth power station.
   The comedy shows the indomitable revolutionary spirit of 
servicemen and their optimistic life. The Philosophical idea 
of the comedy is that the great consanguinity between the 
Supreme Commander and his men is the source of the 
revolutionary spirit of servicemen.
   The performance demonstrated the unshakable faith and 
will and militant stamina of the army and the people to 
complete the juche revolution under the Party's leadership.
   The art propaganda team members put on stage art pieces 
of various forms with a high degree of militant spirit, 
appeal and impressiveness.
   Their performance fully represented the noble mental and 
moral traits of the KPA, which is famous for its unshakable 
ideology and faith. It also demonstrated the effect of local 
revolutionary and militant art propaganda on servicemen's 
heroic struggle and feats.
   Secretary Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction and 
thanks to the creating staffs and artistes of the film 
studio and the propaganda team for the light comedy that is 
of great importance in cognition and education and for the 
brisk art propaganda to instil the servicemen with fighting 
spirit and courage.
   He noted with high appreciation that they have produced 
many films and light comedies of high ideological and 
artistic value in line with the Party's Juche-based policy 
of literature and art and conducted effective art propaganda 
as the anti-Japanese guerrillas did, so that they could 
actively encourage the servicemen and the people in the 
efforts to strengthen the revolutionary army and implement 
the party's military line.
   He added that they are honorable guards in charge of the 
ideological front for the modelling of the whole army on the 
Juche idea.
   He gave them important tasks for more brisk art 
activities. 
   The audience included KPA Vice Marshal Jo Myong Rok, 
Director of the KPA General Political Department= KPA Vice 
Marshal Kim Yong Chun, Chief of the KPA General Staff= Choe 
thae Bok, Kim Kuh Thae, Kim Ki Nam and Kim Yong Sun, 
secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea Central 
Committee= and other senior officials of the party and the 
army as well as servicemen.

articles.title: South Korea's ceaseless military provocations denounced
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung's birthday to be commemorated in Madagascar
  Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The inaugural meeting of 
the Madagascan national preparatory committee for 
commemorating the 85th birth anniversary of the great leader 
President Kim Il Sung was held in Antananarivo on March 12.
   The Chairman of the Madagascar-Korea Friendship 
Association and the Vice-chairman of the Madagascan 
Solidarity Committee told the meeting that the revolutionary 
people of the world are revering the respected President
Kim Il Sung as a genius of humankind and the great leader of 
the world revolution and praying for his immortal life.
   They said the revolutionary cause started by him has been 
successfully carried forward by Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
   The Chairman of the Madagascar-Korea Friendship 
Association was elected Chairman of the national preparatory 
committee.
   It was decided at the meeting to set the days from March 
15 to April 15, 1997, as a month of commemoration and 
organize various activities during the month.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on bellicose utterances of warmaniac
articles.content:
South Korea's ceaseless military provocations denounced
   Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppets 
are continuing grave military provocations under the pretext 
of "threat from the north" to render the situation strained.
   In this regard the Secretariat of the Committee for the 
Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland issued its 
information no. 731 monday.
   The information said they are ceaselessly committing 
grave military provocations in the western and central 
sectors of the front in march following February and 
frantically staging, in collusion with outsiders, various 
war games against the fellow countrymen in the north.
   Owing to the recklesss war moves of the United States and 
the south Korean warmaniacs the situation in the Korean 
Peninsula is so dangerous that a war may break out anytime 
and peace of the country is confronted with a grave 
challenge, it stressed, and went on:
   The south Korean rulers are now making bellicose remarks 
one after another and kicking up war rackets, intentionally 
straining the situation. Their moves are not because of 
"threat" and "provocation" by the north but because of their 
insidious purpose of unleashing war as a way out of the 
ruling crisis.
   Confrontation and war can never be a way out for those on 
the verge of death.
   If the south Korean rulers persist in war in defiance of 
the unanimous protest at home and abroad, it will only 
precipitate their miserable downfall.
   The Kim Young Sam group must act with discretion,  
squarely seeing the invincible might of our people and the 
people's army.

articles.title: Friendship gathering on Day of Pakistan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on bellicose utterances of warmaniac
   Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, the traitor 
kim Young Sam showed up at a "commissioning ceremony" 
of the puppet air force academy, at which he blared that 
they should maintain "alert readiness to cope with possible 
military provocation by the north".
   Commenting on this, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun today 
says:
   These days, Kim Young Sam is more zealously inciting 
the fever of confrontation and war against the north with 
frequent visits to the academies of three services of the 
puppet army, while continuing with war exercises. This is an 
offspring of the extreme ruling crisis.
   The Kim Young Sam group are on the verge of an inevitable 
ruin for all kinds of treacherous crimes they have committed 
while in office, for the retrogressive revision of fascist 
laws and for their direct involvement in the largest-ever 
financial scandal.
   Some time ago, it was disclosed that Kim Young Sam's son 
had exerted influence upon "state affairs as a whole", thus 
enraging the south Korean people.
   Home and foreign observers estimate that the traitor Kim 
Young Sam is on the edge of death.
   This is why the south Korean puppets are trying to get 
out of this hopeless crisis by unleashing a war against the 
fellow countrymen with outside forces.
   It is a big miscalculation, if the Kim Young Sam group 
intend to find a way out in intensifying the moves of 
confrontation and war against the north.
   The more frantically they make war preparations against 
the north, the earlier the day will come when they will be 
ruined.

articles.title: Press review
articles.content:
Friendship gathering on Day of Pakistan
  Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A friendship gathering took 
place at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace in 
Pyongyang on Monday to mark the day of Pakistan.
   Invited to the gathering were Pakistani Ambassador to 
Korea Rehmdil Bhatti and his Embassy officials.
   The visitors went round the palace before they 
appreciated an art performance.

articles.title: Party marks end of Korea visit of WFP officials
articles.content:
Press review 
   Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Papers here today frontpage 
a report that Secretary Kim Jong Il, Supreme Commander of the 
Korean People's Army, on March 17 enjoyed a light comedy 
"Blessings" performed by artistes of the KPA April 25 film 
studio and a performance given by the art propaganda team of 
KPA large combined unit 337.
   Papers convey news that Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented 
with a gift by the visiting delegation of the propaganda and 
education ideological committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary 
Party.
   Rodong Sinmun carries an article headlined "recalling a 
great man in Jilin" written by Lei Shufang, a chinese woman 
who participated in the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle 
with deep comradely amity with the great leader President 
Kim Il Sung in her teens.
   Under the title "to defend independence is the way of 
patriotism", an aphorism of Secretary Kim Jong Il, the paper 
edits articles in this regard.
   Conspicuous in papers is news of land management in 
spring progressing apace across the country.
   A commentary of Rodong Sinmun denounces the traitor Kim 
Young Sam for inciting a fever of war against the north at 
the "commissioning ceremony" of the puppet air force 
academy.
   Conveyed in the press is news that the Kwangju and south 
Jolla Provincial measure committee for defending democracy 
published a declaration of 10,200 people of Kwangju and 
south Jolla Province condemning Kim Young Sam.
   Printed in Rodong Sinmun is information issued by the 
Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification 
of the Fatherland flailing the south Korean puppets for 
keying up tensions with ceaseless grave military 
provocations.
   Minju Joson comes out with an article denouncing the 
cabinet reshuffle carried out by the Kim Young Sam group.
   Rodong Sinmun runs an article branding the start of U.S. 
"Radio Free Asia" as a base move to realize its wild 
ambition for dominating Asia and another article laying bare 
the deceptive nature of the "welfare policy" in capitalist 
society.
   An article of Minju Joson analyzes the phenomenon of "the 
rich getting richer and the poor poorer" in capitalist 
society.

articles.title: Party at Russian Consulate General
articles.content:
Party marks end of Korea visit of WFP officials 
  Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Christian Lemaire, resident 
coordinator of the United Nations here, gave a party on 
Monday to mark the end of the Korea visit of the Executive 
Director of the World Food Programme and her entourage. 
   Invited to the party were Vice-Premier Kong Jin Thae, 
other officials concerned and diplomatic envoys accredited 
to the DPRK.
   Catherine Bertini, Executive Director of the WFP, and her 
entourage, Birgitta Karlgren, representative of the WFP, and 
Runa Soerensen, acting representative of the United Nations 
Children's Fund, were present.
   Speeches were made at the party.

articles.title: True colors of hack newspaper revealed again
articles.content:
Party at Russian Consulate General 
   Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A party was given Monday at 
the Russian Consulate General in Chongjin on the occasion of 
the 48th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on 
economic and cultural cooperation between Korea and Russia.
   Invited to the party were Hyon Tong hyok, vice-chairman 
of the north Hamgyong Provincial administrative and economic 
committee, and officials concerned.
   The Russian Consul General and officials of the consulate 
general in Chongjin were present at the party.
   Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Judgement of Kim Young Sam demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
True colors of hack newspaper revealed again 
   Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Japanese newspaper 
Sankei Shimbun March 13 quoted a former "North Korean agent 
in Japan" as saying it is true that "a North Korean agent 
kidnapped a Japanese girl".  
   Needless to say, this is a base political drama to do 
harm to the DPRK in cooperation with south Korea's puppet 
Agency for National Security Planning. 
   An Ryong Jin, who they say was once a North Korea's 
operative, has never been on the rolls of the DPRK.
   We already know that the south Korean puppets are a group 
of villians engrossed in mean acts and journalists of Sankei 
Shimbun are hack writers bereft of the duty of the press. We 
can hardly repress  scorn at the nonsensical report made by 
them in a far-fetched way.
   As is known, the Sankei Shimbun has long since engaged in 
false propaganda against the DPRK as a political waiting 
maid of the south Korean puppets.
   Last year and the previous year, they described the flood 
damage in the DPRK as "exaggerated," quoting south Korea's 
"National Unification Board" and "sources of South Korea". 
Not content with this, they spread a lot of false rumors to 
mislead public opinion, only to be denounced as  "hack 
writers" and "rubbish paper" by the unbiased world public.
   The continued anti-DPRK smear campaign is motivated by a 
plot of the south Korean puppets to bridge over the ruling 
crisis by inventing a shocking case.
   The south Korean political situation is now in a serious 
crisis and confusion owing to the retrogressive revision of 
"labour law" and the Hanbo loan scandal. The "civilian"-
veiled "government"  is rejected by the people as "too old a 
regime" and Kim Young Sam as a "dead man".
   To find a way out, the south Korean puppets needed a 
shocking case to divert public attention elsewhere, and the 
sankei shimbun was used in the operation.

articles.title: No force on earth can break strength of Korea
articles.content:
Judgement of Kim Young Sam demanded in S. Korea 
   Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- the Kwangju and South Jolla 
Provincial Measure Committee for Defence of Democracy made 
public a declaration of 10,200 people in Kwangju and south 
jolla Province on Mar. 11, according to the newspaper 
"Hangyore" based in South Korea.
   The declaration carries "article to all people" with 
slogans reading "We will bring Kim Young Sam and the new 
Korea party to trial !", "Abolish evil laws !", 
"Punish mastermind of Hanbo scandal !" and  "liquidate 
civilian-veiled dictatorship !" and so on.
   In the article it warned the incompetent and corrupt Kim 
Young Sam "regime", the "Agency for National Security 
Planning" trying to stamp out human rights by revising 
"law", and wicked businesses satisfying avarice with the 
sacrifice of workers and minor enterprises that any forces 
trying to turn back the wheel of democratic development will 
not escape an iron hammer of history and justice. 
   The railroaded "labor laws" and "Law on the Agency for 
National Security Planning" and the Hanbo incident are by no 
means different cases but a structural matter produced by 
social ruling power including the civilian dictatorial 
power, security information agency and monopoly businesses, 
the declaration said.
   It appealed to all the people to turn out to realise 
democracy and freedom in South Korea, establish respect for 
human rights and sure employment and achieve peaceful 
reunification of the nation.

articles.title: We visualize great 21st century -- S. Korean's  article
articles.content:
No force on earth can break strength of Korea 
  Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun March 17 came 
out with a political essay entitled "pine tree on Nam hill
will remain green for ever".
   The essay said that the strong spirit of the green pine 
tree on Nam hill will be everlasting together with the 
history of Kim Il Sung's nation, who will always remember 
the three great men of mangyongdae, the glory of the Korean 
nation.
   In Korea, the green pine tree on Nam hill in mangyongdae 
where the great leader President Kim Il Sung was born is 
symbolic of the indomitable stamina of the Korean people to 
continue the revolution.
   The essay noted that this pine tree is not only a noble 
spirit of Kim Hyong jik, an indomitable revolutionary 
fighter who set forth the idea of "aim high" and embarked 
upon the road of the revolution but also a witness of the 
great devoted services made by  President Kim Il Sung and 
Secretary Kim Jong Il for the revolution, holding fast to 
this idea generation after generation.
   The essay stressed that the pine tree is a symbol of the 
noble idea and optimism with which to bring the spring of 
life at any cost.  It further said:
   The Korean revolution advances without any slightest 
vacillation under any political offensive, economic 
pressure and ideological and cultural infiltration on the 
part of the imperialists, true to the idea of the red flag.
   This is precisely the unbreakable stamina of the Korean 
revolution which is advancing under the guidance of the 
respected General Kim Jong Il and the spirit of the green 
pine tree.
   Herein lies the unshakable will of the Korean 
revolutionaries who are determined never to become slaves 
again but to live as masters of the independent nation 
forever.
   The pine tree is the invincible stamina of the Korean 
people who are ready to carry forward and accomplish the 
Korean revolution generation after generation.
   Kim Hyong jik's idea of "aim high" is being fully 
realised on this land, thanks to General Kim Jong Il, who is 
firmly determined to make our country and motherland more 
prosperous, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung.
   We will certainly win as we are guided by Secretary 
Kim Jong Il, a peerless General who has fully personified 
the spirit of the green pine tree on Nam hill.
   No force on earth can break the strength of the 
singlehearted unity of Korea around General Kim Jong Il and 
the might of the pine tree.

articles.title: Greetings to Saharan Foreign Minister
articles.content:
We visualize great 21st century -- S. Korean's article
  Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Ri Un Song, member of the 
south Korean society for future, published an article titled 
"We visualize the great 21st century", Seoul-based radio 
voice of national salvation said.
   The author said in the article that the great 21st 
century is forthcoming in the north.
   Many countries and nations that had been oppressed in the 
past are of view that the 21st century will be Kim Jong Il's 
century in which the world becomes independent, peaceful, 
democratic and prosperous with the reunified Korean 
peninsula in the centre, he said.
   On mt. Paektu President Kim Il Sung, the sun of the 
nation, made clear for the first time what the world desired 
by humankind is like, he said. He founded the great juche 
idea, an anthropocentric idea which reflects the centuries-
old desire of humankind and considers man the master of the 
world, opened up a new era of love and trust and reared the 
first masters of the world.  The author noted:
   General Kim Jong Il, who is carrying forward the cause of 
President Kim Il Sung, is a great pioneer and guide of the 
century who is giving concrete shape to the future society.
   The future of the 21st century, mirrored in the rising 
generations of the north, is the most dignified, happy, 
powerful, beautiful and optimistic.
   With General Kim Jong Il's ideas as their motto and 
outlook on life, they are living a dignified life even in 
the "arduous march", convinced of victory.
   Since their birth, they are fed, clothed and educated at 
state expense.
   They have become the masters of the 21st century under 
the leadership of General Kim Jong Il, symbolic of the 
future society, independent, creative and prospering.
   He leads not only the Korean nation but all other people 
around the world along the road of independence. This is why 
he is praised by all the people as the guide of the 21st 
century and their eternal savior.
   Many nations on the globe have taken their choices, 
no longer bullied by large countries, in the way general
Kim Jong Il does, and have shaped popular policies, learning 
from the north's politics. The 21st century, which will be 
permeated with his ideas and shining with his great image, 
is in sight.

articles.title: Gift to Secy. Kim Jong Il from WFP
articles.content:
Greetings to Saharan Foreign Minister
  Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Kim Yong 
Nam of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea sent a 
message of greetings to Bachir Mustapha sayed upon his 
appointment as Saharan Foreign Minister.
   The message wished him success in his new office and 
expressed the conviction that the friendly relations between 
the two countries will continue to develop on good terms.

articles.title: WFP Executive Director inspects flood-hit areas
articles.content:
Gift to Secy. Kim Jong Il from WFP
   Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Secretary Kim Jong Il 
received a gift from the World Food Programme.
   The gift was handed to Vice-Premier Kong Jin Thae by 
Catherine Bertini, Executive Director of the World Food 
Programme, on a visit to Korea.
   Secretary Kim Jong Il was also presented  with a gift by 
the Executive Director in her name.

articles.title: UN delegation here
articles.content:
WFP Executive Director inspects flood-hit areas
  Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Catherine Bertini, 
Executive Director of the World Food Programme (WFP), today 
inspected flood-hit areas in Unpha County, north Hwanghae 
Province of the DPRK, following her inspection of Rinsan and 
Phyongsan counties of the Province Monday.
   The Executive Director was accompanied by Vice-chairwoman 
of the State Agricultural Commission Kim Yong Suk and 
officials concerned and Birgitta Karlgren, representative of 
the WFP to Korea.
   She went round Unpha bridge and residential districts 
around it devastated by flood before being informed of the 
damage scale.
   Then she met and talked with farmers at sites for the 
rehabilitation of devastated farm lands, which is 
progressing with wfp's assistance. She also visited a 
nursery, a kindergarten and houses.
   She said the inspection made her witness the catastrophic 
consequences of the two years of natural disasters.
   For the devastated Arable lands to be restored to 
original state and capabilities to be created to decrease 
possible flood damage in future, a lot of work such as 
afforestation and embankment should be done, Bertini 
stressed. This needs additional food supply from the world 
community, she added.
   In her speech at a banquet given to mark the end of her 
visit to Korea Monday, she said that through the visit she 
could confirm at first hand that the materials donated for 
wfp activities in the DPRK have been successfully used.
   It is important above anything else to render emergency 
food supply amounting to 100,000 tons as called for by the 
wfp this time, she said. 
   She called once again upon the donator nations and 
international community to give much more humanitarian 
assistance which will contribute to improving the food 
situation.
   The Executive Director and her party left here today.
